summary: REQ-3 appears implemented via mobile-only single-letter tab labels in DailyDashboard. Mobile navigation controls were added in Header, but they are icon-only and may not satisfy the requirement that controls be clearly labeled on phone-sized screens. The diff is truncated for MainDashboardâ€™s FinanceTrends implementation, so full verification of Compare removal / Net Balance-only rendering cannot be conclusively confirmed from the provided snippet, though the file summary claims it.

missing_requirements.requirement: On phone-sized screens, provide clearly labeled, tappable controls to switch between Dashboard and Daily View.
missing_requirements.reason: Mobile navigation buttons are present, but they show only icons (no visible text labels), which may not meet the 'clearly labeled' acceptance criterion.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'Loading...' placeholder / stabilized username display logic in the header user menu.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; this changes header behavior unrelated to the specified mobile navigation and chart/tab label changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Logout now clears the React Query cache (queryClient.clear()).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; modifies client-side logout behavior beyond the specified UI changes.
